DOC.brief_title: Bispectral Index Clinical Parameters Evaluation Dental Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: One-hundred ASA I / II volunteer gender select different dental speciality clinic ( restorative dentistry , endodontics , implantology , oral surgery ) Dental Institute Pontifical Catholic University Rio de Janeiro PUC-Rio ) . After anamnesis obtain write informed consent , volunteer ask fill 11-point numerical scale order quantify initial pain . The scale show 0 `` pain '' 10 `` bad pain imaginable '' . In addition , volunteer also ask fill facial image scale order determine initial anxiety . This scale show four level : 0 correspond absolutely calm ; 1 - slightly stress ; 2 - stress ; 3 - extremely stress . The volunteer position dental chair instruct fill Trieger test ( psychomotor evaluation ) follow period : 1 ) sedation ; 2 ) sedation ( 10 minute respiratory stabilization N2O/O2 ) ; 3 ) 10 minute end sedation . The number wrong connected point ( precision ) time require fill point use estimate psychomotor ability . A pulse oxymeter place volunteer ' thumb electronic sphygmomanometer position forearm order evaluate oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) , systolic diastolic pressure , hearth rate moment Trieger test . Respiratory rate evaluate moment , direct observation thoracic movement . The electrode BIS monitor place value obtain operatory period previously describe , despite continuous BIS monitoring . After BIS-signal stabilization , dental procedure sedation N2O/O2 explain volunteer . Two previously calibrate operator instal BIS electrode , apply Trieger test sedate subject . A third operator perform dental treatment . Five minute reach ideal sedation level , anesthetic solution ( 1.8 mL 2 % lidocaine 1:100.000 epinephrine ) inject . Right end clinical procedure , 100 % O2 provide 5 minute new Trieger test fill . The volunteer dismiss last Trieger test compatible first one . At moment , also ask discomfort complication . The duration type dental procedure also register . The N2O/O2 equipment compose two flow meter anti-hypoxia system valve , 70 % N2O maximum disposal 30 L/min O2 valve immediate oxygen dispensation . Masks individually select , 100 % O2 ( 6 L/min ) dispense respiratory rate stabilization . N2O incremented 10 % 2 minute ( 70 % max , necessary ) follow signal notice : silence , relax/comfort report , decrease eyelid movement , decrease spontaneous body movement , warm sensation , tingle sensation numbness foot , hand oral region , slightly euphoric sensation . The dental procedure start 5 min ideal sedation achievement . The sedation level score use five-points Observer 's Assessment Alertness/Sedation ( OAA/S ) scale , previously describe elsewhere . In addition , BIS use monitor brain cortical activity 0.5 30 Hz frequency bandwidth , check impedance every reading . Impedance remain 800 ohm . Zipprep-type electrode place accord manufacturer instruction . Fp1-Fpz monitor channel 1 , Fp2-Fpz channel 2 ground reference place pre-auricular region . BIS BIS channel wave record successive 2 second period 13 updated every 5 second . The automatic artifact detection rejection system BIS monitor use . Baseline level obtain sedation . Results submit Kruskal-Wallis ' ( Dunn ) , Friedman 's , Mann-Whitney 's Spearman 's correlation test . The significance level set 5 % . The analysis perform use BioEstat 5.0 .
DOC.criteria: Any gender ; Age 18 60 year ; Needing one specialized treatment , restorative dentistry , endodontics , implantology , oral surgery . Compulsive personality ; Claustrophobia ; Severe personal disorder ; Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ; Recent ear surgery history ; Use bleomycin last year ; Use CNS depressant ; Use analgesic antiinflammatory agent one week study ; Former drug addict ; Pregnancy .
